description: Trail follows a few switchbacks against a few rock faces. You will arrive at the falls when you notice the trail turns muddy from the spray.
directions: Follow the icefields Parkway to the Bridal Veil Falls viewpoint, you will notice a long pullout on the east side of the highway 9 km from the Banff Jasper  Park Boundry at Sunwapta Pass.
title: Panther Falls
